translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
Think about that for a moment.
All your efforts...
personal, professional, carnal...
utter and absolute slaves...
to some cosmically predetermined set of outcomes.
translation.es: …de una serie de resultados cósmicamente predeterminados.

translation.en: As if we have no say in, let alone culpability for,
translation.es: Como si no tuviéramos derecho a opinar, y mucho menos fuéramos culpables

translation.en: the defining moments in our lives.
translation.es: de los momentos decisivos de nuestras vidas.

translation.en: If you want a life of purpose...
translation.es: Si quieres una vida con propósito,

translation.en: by inverting the notion...
that everything happens for a reason.
translation.es: …de que todo sucede por una razón.

translation.en: Redefine it.
Not as some future explanation
for terrible tragedy, or glorious achievement,
translation.es: de una terrible tragedia o un logro glorioso,

translation.en: but as validation...
of the deliberate choices that lead us to these critical junctures
translation.es: …de las elecciones deliberadas que nos llevan a esas coyunturas críticas

translation.en: in the first place.
Assert authority over chance, fate,
translation.es: Asume tu autoridad sobre el azar y el destino,

translation.en: and destiny, because everything does happen for a reason.
translation.es: Asume tu autoridad sobre el azar y el destino, porque las cosas sí suceden por una razón.

translation.en: And that reason is you.
To attain elite success,
translation.es: GRABANDO Para lograr el éxito de la élite,

translation.en: you must be willing to make the hard choices,
translation.es: debes estar dispuesto a tomar decisiones difíciles,

translation.en: do the unpleasant things, risk your most valuable assets,
translation.es: hacer cosas desagradables, arriesgar tus activos más valiosos

translation.en: and do away with the shackles designed by society to limit us:
translation.es: y rechazar los grilletes diseñados por la sociedad para limitarnos:

translation.en: love, marriage, children.
translation.es: el amor, el matrimonio, los hijos.

translation.en: And above all,
the uninvited imposition
of lesser people's moral agendas.
translation.es: de las preferencias morales de la gente inferior.

translation.en: Because nothing worthwhile
translation.es: Porque nada que valga la pena…

translation.en: is ever achieved without sacrifice.
And true greatness...
only comes to those...
willing to pursue it...
at... any cost.
Ladies, gentlemen, Mr. and Mrs. Sean Donovan!
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, Sean Donovan y esposa.

translation.en: Ah, let's see it. Come on, kiss her!
- - Yeah!
Yeah!
Hold on there, miss!
May I help you?
Oh, hello again, Mrs. Donovan.
Hi.
Sorry.
I have some legal paperwork for Miss Montgomery.
translation.es: Traigo unos documentos legales para la señorita Montgomery.

translation.en: I'm just gonna run up for a quick signature.
Uh, I still need to call you up.
It's really coming down out there, huh?
Hey! Hey!
Hey! Wait! Wait!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
This is Lisa Donovan, and I need to speak with my husband right now.
translation.es: Soy Lisa Donovan. Necesito hablar con mi esposo. ¡Ahora!

translation.en: Hello? Can anybody hear me?
- - Fuck.
Sean!
Sean!
Sean?
Sean!
Call it off!
Forecast for the Bay Area today will be cool and breezy
translation.es: TRES DÍAS ANTES El pronóstico para el Área de la Bahía hoy será fresco y ventoso…

translation.en: All right, all right.
Castro, I get it. I get it. I get it.
We'll go on a walk.
Just let me get my pants on, and we'll get out there in two minutes.
translation.es: Me pongo los pantalones y saldremos en dos minutos.

translation.en: All right. I see you. I see you.
We're going outside right now. Give me a second.
translation.es: Ya nos vamos. Dame un segundo.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey.
Will you be here when we get back for a proper good morning?
translation.es: ¿Estarás aquí cuando vuelva para darnos los buenos días?

translation.en: I wish.
I have to stop by the lab before my first pitch.
translation.es: Debo ir al laboratorio antes de mi primera presentación.

translation.en: I needed to make sure that my presentation transferred.
translation.es: Quiero asegurarme de que el archivo se haya transferido.

translation.en: I know the feeling.
First pitch is always the scariest. Just gotta stay in the moment.
translation.es: La primera siempre es la más difícil. Solo concéntrate en el momento.

translation.en: Try not to think of all the things you can't control, focus on what you can.
translation.es: No pienses en lo que no puedes controlar. Concéntrate en lo que sí puedes.

translation.en: What if I freeze?
First Triple- A game I played... Giants sent their scouts down.
translation.es: En el primer Triple A que jugué, los Gigantes enviaron a sus cazatalentos.

translation.en: On my first windup, my cleat broke off my shoe
translation.es: En mi primer lanzamiento, el taco frontal de mi zapato se rompió y la bola se desvió

translation.en: and the ball sailed about five feet over the catcher.
translation.es: En mi primer lanzamiento, el taco frontal de mi zapato se rompió y la bola se desvió como metro y medio sobre el cácher.

translation.en: I knew if I didn't pull it together right then, I'd never get another shot.
translation.es: Sabía que si no lo hacía bien, no habría más oportunidades.

translation.en: So... I picked up the cleat,
and put in my pocket as a symbol of all the obstacles,
translation.es: y lo puse en mi bolsillo como símbolo de los obstáculos,

translation.en: real and imagined, bouncing around inside my head.
translation.es: reales e imaginarios, que rebotaban en mi cabeza.

translation.en: Figured if I could condense all that noise into something smaller to fit in a pocket...
translation.es: Si lograba condensar ese ruido en algo más pequeño, que cupiera en mi bolsillo…

translation.en: then all my self- doubt could be managed.
translation.es: entonces podría lidiar con mis dudas.

translation.en: Threw my first no- hitter that day.
translation.es: Ese día fue mi primer no-hitter.

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
Thank you.
- Come on, Castro. -
Good morning. My name is Lisa Ruiz- Donovan,
and I am seeking an equity partner for my medical solutions company,
translation.es: y estoy buscando un socio inversor para mi compañía de soluciones médicas,

translation.en: Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing. Emigen Molecular Sequencing.
- Hmm. - Good job, young lady.
Thanks for coming in.
This isn't an area we're interested in exploring.
translation.es: No es un área que nos interese.

translation.en: Let us talk and get back to you.
Okay?
Everybody's hard at work, I see.
Anymore billion- dollar breakthroughs?
- Just the one. - Minus the billion.
Any calls, Sophie? Landlord.
- Want me to get him? - I'll call from my desk.
- Did you eat? - Yep.
Both feet.
Scratched three VCs off the list.
translation.es: Taché tres inversores de la lista.

translation.en: Before I make this call, please tell me there's enough in our account to cover rent.
translation.es: Antes de que lo llame, dime que tenemos suficiente para la renta.

translation.en: Yeah, for two months.
But payroll is another story.
I know you don't want to hear this, but I think it's time we consider approaching the drug companies.
translation.es: Sé que no quieres oír esto, pero creo que hay que pensar en las farmacéuticas.

translation.en: No way. They would just buy us to kill us.
True, but at least you would get your money back.
translation.es: Sí, pero al menos recuperarías tu dinero.

translation.en: You haven't taken a salary since we started this thing.
translation.es: No has cobrado desde que empezamos.

translation.en: And you could be making five times what I'm paying you anyplace else.
translation.es: Y tú podrías ganar cinco veces más de lo que te pago en otro lado.

translation.en: - Ten. - See?
You're in for the cause, same as I am.
translation.es: Estás aquí por la causa, igual que yo.

translation.en: I would deny that in court, bankruptcy or otherwise.
translation.es: Lo negaré en el tribunal, haya bancarrota o lo que sea.

translation.en: Fine, I will continue to help you on your hunt for the golden ticket.
translation.es: Bien, seguiré ayudándote en tu búsqueda del boleto dorado

translation.en: As long as you promise to rework your pitch.
What's wrong with my pitch? We fact- checked it a hundred times.
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene de malo? Todos los datos son correctos.

translation.en: Facts are not your problem.
It's emotional engagement.
I know this is outside of your comfort zone.
translation.es: Sé que está fuera de tu zona de confort,

translation.en: But you already have your way in.
You just have to use it.
Catch us up, guys.
Trevor McIntire, seven years old, pulled a frying pan of hot grease onto his head.
translation.es: Trevor McIntire, 7 años, le cayó grasa caliente.

translation.en: - Guardian? - Welfare mom. Still trying to locate her.
translation.es: - ¿Y el tutor? - Aún no encontramos a la madre.

translation.en: Looks like old scarring under the new injury. Let's get him up to Burn One for a head- to- toe.
translation.es: Creo ver cicatrices viejas bajo la herida. Haré una revisión integral en Quemados.

translation.en: You've got a nice strong arm there, Trev. You like baseball?
translation.es: Tienes un brazo fuerte, Trev. ¿Te gusta el béisbol?

translation.en: I'm gonna go up with him.
Hang in there, little man. All right?
Giants sure could use a guy like you in the bullpen.
translation.es: A los Gigantes les vendría bien un lanzador como tú.

translation.en: Hey, Todd.
- I'll catch you back at the van. - Yeah.
Ooh, hey, Doc, can I get some attention over here? It hurts when I do this.
translation.es: Doctora, ¿puede atenderme? Duele cuando hago esto.

translation.en: Oh.  Maybe you should stop doing that.
translation.es: Tal vez debería dejar de hacer eso.

translation.en: I don't know, I can't seem to help myself.
It's automatic when I get around a certain someone.
translation.es: Pasa cuando me acerco a cierta persona.

translation.en: Todd, please. Can't you see this isn't the time or the place?
translation.es: Tyler, por favor, ¿no ves que no es el momento ni el lugar?

translation.en: Hmm. Well, what I could see is you looking a little tense,
translation.es: Lo que noté es que te ves un poco tensa,

translation.en: so I thought I'd try to put a smile on your face.
translation.es: así que pensé en hacerte sonreír.

translation.en: What's wrong?
We just lost a patient on the table.
translation.es: Perdimos un paciente en la cirugía.

translation.en: Oh, babe, I'm sorry.
On top of that, we're short- staffed again.
translation.es: Además, tenemos poco personal otra vez.

translation.en: And since I'm the low resident on the totem pole, I'm forced to pick up the slack.
translation.es: Y como soy la residente más nueva, me toca hacer más cosas.

translation.en: Well, as long as I've known you,
translation.es: Desde que te conozco, nadie nunca te obligó a hacer nada

translation.en: no one's ever forced you to do something you don't wanna do, Ange.
translation.es: Desde que te conozco, nadie nunca te obligó a hacer nada que no quisieras hacer, Ange. Puedes negarte.

translation.en: You can always say no.
translation.es: que no quisieras hacer, Ange. Puedes negarte.

translation.en: You're right.
I need to have that conversation. My girl. See you at home.
translation.es: - Tengo que hacer eso. - Esa es mi chica. Te veo en casa.

translation.en: Okay. Bye.
You sure I can go?
- Stop. - You sure I'm good?
Name your crime, Todd.
I don't know.
I'd kill Hitler. I'd for sure kill Hitler.
translation.es: Yo mataría a Hitler, sin duda.

translation.en: That's not a confession, that's more a moral imperative.
translation.es: Esa no es una confesión, es más un imperativo moral.

translation.en: Angela, show your man how it's done.
Yeah, no, there are too many guy questions in this bowl.
translation.es: Hay demasiadas preguntas para chicos en el tazón.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, everyone.
This party is no longer accepting apologies, only confessions.
translation.es: Este grupo ya no acepta disculpas, solo confesiones.

translation.en: - You're up. - Oh.
I thought maybe you'd retire this game along with my brother's 20s.
translation.es: Pensé que este juego se había ido con los veintes de mi hermano.

translation.en: Forever young, baby, forever young.
Uh... Would you ever have sex with someone while you're in a relationship with someone else?
translation.es: ¿Tendrías sexo con alguien mientras estás en una relación?.

translation.en: - Oh. - I'm guessing this is yours, Lionel. All the good ones are.
translation.es: - Supongo que es tuya, Lionel. - Como todas las buenas.

translation.en: Hold on. We talking, like, swinging, hall pass, or whatever's trendy with the gay boys these days?
translation.es: ¿Hablamos de swingers, un permiso especial o lo que sea que hagan los gais hoy?

translation.en: Ooh! I'm talking complete and total transparency.
translation.es: Hablo de total y absoluta transparencia.

translation.en: Sex can be in the same room with multiple people.
translation.es: Puede ser en la misma habitación con varias personas.

translation.en: Sorry to disappoint, but I already got all the man I can handle.
translation.es: Lamento decepcionarte, pero ya tengo todo el hombre que puedo manejar.

translation.en: He's enough for me.
What? Look, look.
If it's all above board then I'm definitely, definitely
translation.es: Mira, si es sin esconderse, entonces yo quiero un sándwich

translation.en: order me up a hot meat sandwich with two slices
translation.es: Mira, si es sin esconderse, entonces yo quiero un sándwich  con dos rebanadas de J-Lo y mi querida Angela.

translation.en: of J- Lo and my sweet lady Angela.
translation.es: con dos rebanadas de J-Lo y mi querida Angela.

translation.en: Oh, baby, nobody asked you.
Um, will you excuse me while I try to wipe that out of my brain?
translation.es: Disculpen. Trataré de borrar eso de mi cabeza.

translation.en: Okay, so you're saying if you could have a no harm, no foul,
translation.es: Entonces, si tuvieras la oportunidad libre de estar con tu Backstreet Boy favorito,

translation.en: one- off with one of your favorite Backstreet Boys, you'd say no?
translation.es: Entonces, si tuvieras la oportunidad libre de estar con tu Backstreet Boy favorito, ¿la rechazarías?

translation.en: Backstreet Boys...
I might have mentioned your bedroom ceiling was covered in Backstreet posters growing up.
translation.es: Tal vez mencioné que el techo de tu cuarto estaba lleno de pósteres.

translation.en: So was yours.
Amen, sister.
- Hey, cake's in the fridge. - Okay.
translation.es: - El pastel está en la cocina. - Sí.

translation.en: All right. Well, who's next?
Yeah, well, that makes two of us, I guess.
- Oh, sorry. - No.
It's fine.
It's nothing.
- Would you mind handing me that lighter? - Yes.
Who is that?
It's the chief of surgery. Is there a problem at the hospital?
translation.es: - Es el jefe de cirugía. - ¿Pasa algo en el hospital?

translation.en: What's the holdup in here?
Marcos will only be 30 for a year.
translation.es: Marcos solo tendrá 30 por un año.

translation.en: Why don't you pass out the plates and forks and we'll be out in just a sec?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no repartes los platos y tenedores? Ya salimos.

translation.en: Yeah, sure thing.
I didn't mean for any of this to happen.
It just happened.
What does that mean for you and Todd? I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Qué significa eso para tu relación? - No lo sé.

translation.en: I keep telling myself I'm gonna end it, but...
translation.es: Sigo diciéndome que lo terminaré, pero…

translation.en: Look, promise me you won't say anything.
It will kill Todd to hear this secondhand, especially coming from Sean.
translation.es: Todd se moriría si se entera, sobre todo si es por Sean.

translation.en: Angela...
I'm not asking you to lie.
I just need time to figure everything out.
Promise me, Lisa.
How are you feeling about the pitch?
Way less comfortable than I was with the fact- y figure- y version.
translation.es: Mucho menos cómoda que con la versión de datos.

translation.en: But objectively, I know you pointed me in the right direction.
translation.es: Pero siendo objetiva, me señalaste la dirección correcta.

translation.en: Good, 'cause Gage Scott Ventures wants to meet with you tomorrow at 4:00.
translation.es: Me alegro, porque Gage Scott Ventures te verá mañana a las cuatro.

translation.en: Wait, what? I thought they weren't interested.
That was before Mr. Scott found out there was a competitive bid from his old firm.
translation.es: Eso fue hasta que el Sr. Scott descubrió que había una oferta de su antigua firma.

translation.en: So we're peddling fake news now?
I didn't make the rules, I'm just playing the game.
translation.es: No hice las reglas, solo estoy jugando.

translation.en: I thought a little FOMO would go a long way with a guy like that.
translation.es: Pensé que a un tipo así no le gustaría quedar fuera.

translation.en: As it turns out, I was right.
You're an evil genius.
I know. By the way, I am sending you the link.
translation.es: Lo sé. Por cierto, te paso el enlace.

translation.en: This guy's got some seriously stereotypical taste in women.
translation.es: Este tipo tiene un gusto muy estereotípico de las mujeres.

translation.en: You might want to consider wearing something a little less business- y and a little more--
translation.es: Deberías considerar usar algo menos formal y un poco más…

translation.en: - Demeaning? - Don't be naive. We can't afford it.
translation.es: -¿Degradante? - No seas ingenua. Es un lujo serlo.

translation.en: Dog's walked, garbage curbed, dishes done...
translation.es: Ya saqué al perro, tiré la basura, lavé los trastes…

translation.en: Okay to come to bed or you need to keep going?
translation.es: ¿Puedo ir a la cama o necesitas trabajar más?

translation.en: Ugh.
translation.es: ¿Por qué Sean no tiene un gemelo con gusto

translation.en: Why couldn't Sean have a twin who's into a work- obsessed Fortnite enthusiast,
translation.es: ¿Por qué Sean no tiene un gemelo con gusto por veinteañeras adictas al trabajo que juegan Fortnite?

translation.en: pushing the dark side of her 20s?
translation.es: por veinteañeras adictas al trabajo que juegan Fortnite?

translation.en: You'd only break his heart, Cassidy. Not before breaking his balls.
translation.es: - Le romperías el corazón, Cassidy. - Comenzaría por sus bolas.

translation.en: Don't keep her up too late, Romeo.
She's got a misogynist dragon to slay.
translation.es: Tiene un dragón misógino que atrapar.

translation.en: Oh... my God.
How did you even get that on?
You ready to bring some sexy back?
That's the wrong...
boy band and singer.
Come here.
You and Angela settle whatever was going on in the kitchen earlier?
translation.es: ¿Tú y Angela arreglaron lo que estaba pasando en la cocina?

translation.en: Yeah. She's just working through an issue with a co- worker
translation.es: Sí, está resolviendo un problema con alguien del trabajo

translation.en: and needed to get some of it off her chest.
Well, she's been married to Todd since high school.
translation.es: Bueno, está casada con Todd desde la secundaria.

translation.en: If Angela can make that work, whatever this is should be no problem.
translation.es: Si pueden hacer que eso funcione, el resto debería ser pan comido.

translation.en: What else?
You worried about the company?
I just don't wanna let everyone down.
Least of all, you. Nothing you do could ever let me down.
translation.es: - Mucho menos a ti. - Nada que hagas podría decepcionarme.

translation.en: It's all gonna be okay.
How do you know?
Because we've got each other.
translation.es: Nos tenemos el uno al otro.

translation.en: This little munchkin with the devilish grin
is my sister, Emilia.
That's my brother Marcos,
and the little girl with the unfortunate pair of trifocals is yours truly.
translation.es: y la niña con horribles lentes trifocales soy yo.

translation.en: Our mother used to say, whatever mischief one of us didn't conjure up,
translation.es: Mi madre decía que si a uno no se le ocurría una travesura,

translation.en: the other two would. And she was right. We were...
translation.es: se les ocurría a los otros dos. Y tenía razón. Éramos…

translation.en: inseparable growing up.
The three amigos.
But obviously, it's not your real family we're talking about here, right?
translation.es: Pero, obviamente, no hablamos de tu familia real, ¿verdad?

translation.en: My birth parents were killed in a house fire when I was three.
translation.es: Mis padres murieron en un incendio cuando tenía tres años.

translation.en: My nanny ended up adopting me so I wouldn't become a ward of the state, so...
translation.es: Mi niñera me adoptó para no dejarme bajo la tutela del Estado, así que…

translation.en: yeah, this is my real family.
Here's Emilia again with her hospital suitemate Tiffany.
translation.es: Aquí están Emilia y su compañera de cuarto en el hospital, Tiffany.

translation.en: Both were diagnosed with acute lymphocytic leukemia at age eight.
translation.es: A ambas les diagnosticaron leucemia linfocítica aguda a los ochos años.

translation.en: This is six months into treatment.
translation.es: Esto es a los seis meses de tratamiento.

translation.en: As you can see, Tiffany is thriving...
while Emilia...
is struggling.
Acute lymphocytic leukemia, is a curable disease.
translation.es: La leucemia linfocítica aguda, es una enfermedad curable.

translation.en: The drug protocol designed to fight it produces a 90 percent survival rate.
translation.es: El protocolo de fármacos que se usa da una tasa de supervivencia del 90 %.

translation.en: Unfortunately, because of a genetic deviation
in some children's immune cell checkpoints,
translation.es: en los puntos de control de las células inmunológicas de algunos niños

translation.en: the treatment is rendered ineffectual for them.
♪ Happy birthday to you... ♪
My little sister lost her battle six days before her ninth birthday.
translation.es: Mi hermanita perdió la batalla seis días antes de su noveno cumpleaños.

translation.en: If it were me who had gotten sick instead of her, we'd likely both be alive, and...
translation.es: Si yo me hubiera enfermado y no ella, probablemente ambas estaríamos vivas, y…

translation.en: I might not have devoted my life to this cause.
translation.es: …tal vez no habría dedicado mi vida a esta causa.

translation.en: What we're working towards at Emigen,
translation.es: Lo que buscamos hacer en Emigen

translation.en: is a customized map of the blockers and receptors
translation.es: es un mapa individual de los bloqueadores y receptores

translation.en: in every human being's unique immune system
translation.es: que hay en el sistema inmunológico de cada ser humano.

translation.en: so that drug companies can optimize medications
translation.es: Así, las farmacéuticas podrían optimizar los fármacos

translation.en: to work on all patients battling a life- threatening disease...
translation.es: y adaptarlos a todos los pacientes con una enfermedad mortal,

translation.en: not just the lucky ones.
It's, um...
It's a very impressive presentation.
I can honestly say with...
every fiber of what some tell me is a very jaded heart...
translation.es: con cada fibra de mi aburrido corazón,

translation.en: that nothing would make me happier than to invest in your company.
translation.es: que nada me haría más feliz que invertir en tu compañía.

translation.en: But I see a flaw in your proposal that just can't be overlooked.
translation.es: Pero veo una falla en tu propuesta que no puede pasarse por alto.

translation.en: I'm afraid big pharma would drown us in litigation before we even got in the game.
translation.es: Las farmacéuticas nos hundirán en litigios antes de siquiera entrar al juego.

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about your sister.
translation.es: Oye, lamento lo de tu hermana.

translation.en: I, uh, I wish there was more I could do.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Ma'am.
Oh, thank you.
Hey, bartender, how about something cheap and wet?
translation.es: Oye, cantinero, ¿qué tal algo barato y mojado?

translation.en: You asking or offering?
What's it look like?
Looks like you could use a bubble bath and some black coffee.
translation.es: Que te vendrían bien un baño de burbujas y café negro.

translation.en: As it happens...
that's our special tonight.
What's this?
I got us a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.es: Una habitación con vista al Puente de la Bahía.

translation.en: We're celebrating.
How is it possible that you're not...
...reading this picture?
No investor will touch me,
my staff is about to be unemployed.
translation.es: mi personal se quedará sin empleo,

translation.en: Both your life savings and the loan my parents gave me
translation.es: los ahorros de toda tu vida y el préstamo de mis padres

translation.en: has evaporated.
And we can't...
We can't afford a room overlooking the Bay Bridge.
translation.es: …pagar una habitación con vista al Puente de la Bahía.

translation.en: Hey.
Hey.
You can't solve all the world's problems. You knew that going into this.
translation.es: No puedes resolver todos los problemas. Lo sabías cuando comenzaste.

translation.en: That's one.
Two, the hotel room is free,
courtesy of one very cool night manager.
translation.es: cortesía de un gerente nocturno muy amable.

translation.en: Three, if your company does go under, your employees knew the risks
translation.es: Tres, si la empresa se hunde, tus empleados conocían el riesgo y son listos, se las arreglarán.

translation.en: and they're all smart enough to land on their feet.
translation.es: tus empleados conocían el riesgo y son listos, se las arreglarán.

translation.en: We're gonna pay back every cent your parents lent us.
translation.es: Pagaremos cada centavo que tus padres nos prestaron.

translation.en: I'll... rob a bank if I have to.
translation.es: Robaré un banco si es necesario.

translation.en: You would, wouldn't you?
Room 4703.
Give me half an hour to shut the bar down. No one's coming out in this rain anyway.
translation.es: Dame media hora para cerrar el bar. Nadie saldrá con esta lluvia.

translation.en: - Mm? - I'm sorry.
I love you.
Get out of here.
Last call!
I'll have a gin martini.
One olive, very dry.
Sorry.
Didn't see you there.
What kind of gin do you prefer?
Which do you prefer?
I drink whiskey.
I'd have brought it over to you.
Mm. I don't like to drink alone.
Pour yourself a whiskey.
Can't. Company rules.
Won't tell if you won't.
translation.es: No diré nada si tú no lo haces.

translation.en: To your health.
Haven't seen you in here before. You staying at the hotel?
translation.es: Es la primera vez que la veo. ¿Es huésped del hotel?

translation.en: Well, I hope you don't live far.
It's coming down hard out there.
I have a driver. Driver has an umbrella.
translation.es: Tengo chofer. Él tiene un paraguas.

translation.en: He can take us wherever it is you go, when you clock out of there.
translation.es: Puede llevarnos adonde sea que vayas cuando salgas de aquí.

translation.en: No, thank you.
I'm really flattered, but, uh...
I'm married.
All I was offering was a ride.
Oh, damn.  I'm... I'm sorry. Please forget I said that.
translation.es: Maldición. Lo… siento mucho. Olvide lo que dije.

translation.en: Sometimes when it gets late, people tend to get a little--
translation.es: A veces, cuando se hace tarde, la gente tiende a ser un poco…

translation.en: Frisky.
Yeah.
Then what?
And then nothing.
I'm married.
Right.
To that emotional girl who just made a spectacle of herself.
translation.es: Con la chica sensible que recién hizo un espectáculo.

translation.en: That girl's the most important thing in my world.
translation.es: Esa chica es lo más importante para mí.

translation.en: And today was a terrible day for her.
translation.es: Hoy fue un día terrible para ella.

translation.en: Enjoy your drink.
Now who's been misunderstood? Let's just call it even.
Let's.
But now you've got me curious.
From where I'm sitting, she's a very lucky woman.
translation.es: Desde mi posición, veo que es una mujer muy afortunada…

translation.en: This wife of yours.
Tell me about her.
That's more like it.
You feeling any better?
Hmm... I'm not feeling any worse.
Sorry you married such a train wreck.
translation.es: Lamento que te casaras con este desastre.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it.
I actually met a woman after you staggered up here.
translation.es: Conocí a una mujer cuando te fuiste.

translation.en: Can't say I blame you.
I hope you two will be very happy together.
I think she's a little more your type than mine.
translation.es: Creo que es más tu tipo que el mío.

translation.en: Said you'd know who she is.
Anne Montgomery?
I don't-- Is this a joke?
I don't know. Maybe. Who is this lady?
translation.es: No lo sé. Tal vez. ¿Quién es ella?

translation.en: Only one of the most aggressive venture capitalists in town,
translation.es: Solo una de las capitalistas de riesgo más agresivas de la ciudad

translation.en: and by all accounts... born of a jackal.
translation.es: y, por lo que sé, criada por lobos.

translation.en: She definitely struck me as the kind of woman who gets what she wants.
translation.es: Me pareció la clase de mujer que obtiene lo que quiere.

translation.en: And what she wants is to meet my wife.
translation.es: Y lo que quiere es conocer a mi esposa.

translation.en: Wait.
You... told her about me?
Just the basics.
She's hosting some big investor thing and wants to hear more about Emigen.
translation.es: Hará un evento de inversionistas y quiere saber más de Emigen.

translation.en: Think you can... squeeze the jackal onto your calendar?
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedas… hacer espacio en tu agenda para la loba?

translation.en: I can squeeze a lot more than that.
translation.es: Puedo hacer espacio para otras cosas.

translation.en: Morning, Cassidy. You're in early.
- Late, actually. - You were in all night?
translation.es: Me quedé hasta tarde. ¿No dormiste? ¿Qué haces?

translation.en: What in the world were you doing?
Making sure we didn't overlook any potential Hail Marys.
translation.es: Me aseguro de no pasar opciones por alto.

translation.en: That, and a fistful of Adderall.
translation.es: También tomé un puñado de Adderall.

translation.en: Unfortunately, you hired a very thorough CFO.
translation.es: Por desgracia, tu directora financiera es muy meticulosa.

translation.en: I think we're out of options, Lis.
Think again.
What if I told you that we were gonna make a run at Anne Montgomery?
translation.es: ¿Y si te dijera que nos presentaremos ante Anne Montgomery?

translation.en: Well, I'd ask you if you hit your head.
translation.es: Te preguntaría si te golpeaste la cabeza.

translation.en: You don't just demand a meeting with Anne Montgomery. She'd have you executed.
translation.es: No le pides una reunión a Anne Montgomery. Te manda a ejecutar.

translation.en: I didn't have to.
She offered.
She... offered?
Do you know how hard I worked to get us in the door with that woman?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo mucho que intenté conseguir esa reunión?

translation.en: - What did you do? - I promise I'll tell you the story later.
Now I have to cram my brain full of everything I need to win her over.
translation.es: Tengo que llenar mi cerebro de cosas que me hagan ganármela.

translation.en: Start and stop right there.
That has been out for less than a week, and I've already read through it, like, four times.
translation.es: Salió hace menos de una semana y ya lo leí cuatro veces.

translation.en: She is my spirit animal. Really?
translation.es: - Ella es mi animal espiritual. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: Everything I've read about her makes her seem kind of... horrible.
translation.es: Todo lo que leí sobre ella la hace parecer horrible.

translation.en: The world's a horrible place,
translation.es: El mundo es un lugar horrible,

translation.en: but Anne Montgomery wakes up every morning and she eats it for breakfast.
translation.es: pero Anne Montgomery despierta y se lo come en el desayuno.

translation.en: Mrs. McIntire?
It's the EMTs who brought your son to the hospital yesterday.
translation.es: Llevamos a su hijo al hospital ayer.

translation.en: Got him a get well present.
I'll just leave it here by the door, okay?
translation.es: Lo dejaré aquí junto a la puerta, ¿sí?

translation.en: Do you smell smoke?
Mrs. McIntire!
Unit 19 shelter fire, 38 East 19th Street!
translation.es: Cuartel 19, hay un incendio. Calle East 19th 38.

translation.en: - - Everybody out, now!
Mrs. McIntire!
Help!
Help us!
Help!
Help! Help!
Come on! We gotta get you out of here!
Mom and kids checked out okay. Social services has them.
translation.es: La madre y el chico están bien. Están con Servicios Sociales.

translation.en: Cops found the father holed up in the basement.
translation.es: La policía encontró al padre en el sótano.

translation.en: Got a list of convictions a mile long.
translation.es: Tiene una lista de condenas de un kilómetro.

translation.en: Assault, possession, trafficking, aggravated child abuse.
translation.es: Agresión, posesión, tráfico, abuso infantil agravado.

translation.en: No way this guy should've ever made parole.
translation.es: No sé cómo le dieron libertad condicional.

translation.en: Hey, whatever's going through your head, it's not worth it.
translation.es: Lo que sea que estés pensando, no vale la pena.

translation.en: Sean, I'm serious, man. Don't do this. Hey.
translation.es: Sean, hablo en serio, no hagas esto.

translation.en: Sean, what the fuck, man?
You the paramedics who rescued that family?
- Yes, sir. - You two boys are real heroes.
Whole place could've gone up. Heard one of you applied for the academy.
translation.es: Podría haber volado todo. Oí que uno quería entrar a la Academia.

translation.en: We both did.
- What are your names? - Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.
translation.es: ¿Cómo se llaman? Todd Archer, Sean Donovan.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sean and Lisa Donovan to see Miss Montgomery.
translation.es: Sean y Lisa Donovan buscan a la Srta. Montgomery.

translation.en: Welcome.
I'll let her know you've arrived.
Oh, thank you very much.
Excuse me.
You know that guy?
Not exactly.
If you wouldn't mind stepping into the library, Miss Montgomery will be with you shortly.
translation.es: Si no les importa ir a la biblioteca, la Srta. Montgomery irá pronto.

translation.en: Hello, Sean. Don't get up.
I can't spare much time.
You must be Lisa.
Yes. Thank you for the meeting, Miss Montgomery.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias por la reunión, señorita Montgomery.

translation.en: I'll get right to it.
No. No need for that.
I've done my homework. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
translation.es: Ya hice mi tarea. Si no, no estarías aquí.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Oh, don't thank me yet.
Many of my competitors,
like that nauseatingly arrogant Gage Scott,
translation.es: como el arrogante y nauseabundo Gage Scott,

translation.en: whom your husband told me passed on your pitch, make decisions out of fear.
translation.es: que te rechazó, según me dijo tu esposo, toman decisiones por miedo.

translation.en: I operate on potential.
Which is something I believe your company has in spades.
translation.es: Es algo que creo que tu compañía tiene en abundancia.

translation.en: It's you I'm not sold on. How can I convince you otherwise?
translation.es: - Tú eres la que no me convence. - ¿Cómo puedo cambiar su opinión?

translation.en: Have you read my latest book?
- Studied it. - Oh, is that so?
So tell me...
are you two planning on having children?
- Yeah. - Some day.
Right now, I am one hundred percent focused on Emigen.
translation.es: En este momento, estoy 100 % enfocada en Emigen.

translation.en: One hundred percent?
I know you consider the correlation between personal sacrifice and elite success
translation.es: Sé que considera que la correlación entre el sacrificio personal y el éxito

translation.en: to be one of the cornerstones of your business doctrine.
translation.es: es una piedra angular de su doctrina empresarial.

translation.en: Not a cornerstone. The foundation.
translation.es: No es una piedra angular. Es el fundamento.

translation.en: What I mean to say is I am fully prepared for this opportunity.
translation.es: Lo que quiero decir es que estoy preparada para esta oportunidad.

translation.en: Nothing is more important to me. Not even your marriage?
translation.es: - Nada es más importante para mí. - ¿Ni siquiera tu matrimonio?

translation.en: What kind of question is that?
It's a question for your wife.
translation.es: Es una pregunta para tu esposa.

translation.en: I assume Sean told you how we met?
translation.es: Supongo que Sean te contó cómo nos conocimos.

translation.en: He said you struck up a conversation at the hotel bar.
translation.es: Dijo que conversaron en el bar del hotel.

translation.en: Did he also mention that he thought I was coming on to him?
translation.es: ¿También mencionó que creyó que me le estaba insinuando?

translation.en: Smart women have always found Sean attractive.
translation.es: Las mujeres inteligentes lo encuentran atractivo.

translation.en: I consider it a compliment.
So what you're saying is that if I had been trying to seduce your husband...
translation.es: Lo que dices es que aunque hubiera tratado de seducir a tu esposo…

translation.en: you'd still be here?
I'm saying Sean would never cheat on me.
translation.es: Digo que Sean nunca me engañaría.

translation.en: I trust him.
Trust is the most dangerous thing you can give away, Lisa.
translation.es: La confianza es lo más peligroso que puedes regalar, Lisa.

translation.en: But for the sake of argument, let's take cheating out of the equation.
translation.es: Pero solo para establecer mi punto, saquemos el engaño de la ecuación.

translation.en: Say you were fully complicit in our affair.
translation.es: Digamos que tú supieras de nuestro amorío.

translation.en: Would that be an acceptable condition of a firm offer to finance your company?
translation.es: ¿Sería una condición aceptable para una firme oferta de financiamiento?

translation.en: You're asking if I would be willing to trade my husband for my company?
translation.es: ¿Me pregunta si intercambiaría a mi esposo por mi compañía?

translation.en: That would not be an acceptable condition...
translation.es: Esa no sería una condición aceptable,

translation.en: Let's get out of here.
Lisa, wait, it's just a game.
translation.es: Lisa, espera, es solo un juego.

translation.en: Like Lionel and his bowl of questions. Only not nearly as original.
translation.es: - Como Lionel y su tazón de preguntas. - No es tan original.

translation.en: This whole idea was ripped right out of a bad '90s movie.
translation.es: Esta idea salió de una mala película de los 90.

translation.en: She wants to have sex with you, Sean.
- Plain and simple. - Why?
Because Anne is legendary for exploiting people's weaknesses to her advantage.
translation.es: Porque Anne es famosa por explotar las debilidades de la gente a su favor.

translation.en: She sees our marriage as my weakness.
translation.es: Ve a nuestro matrimonio como mi debilidad.

translation.en: Did I get that right?
All but the movie reference.
translation.es: Todo menos lo de la película.

translation.en: I thought that film was quite decent.
translation.es: A mí me pareció bastante buena.

translation.en: By my calculation, it would take roughly 80 million
translation.es: Según mis cálculos, se necesitarían unos 80 millones

translation.en: to optimize your discovery, assuming proof of concept.
translation.es: para optimizar tu descubrimiento, asumiendo que haya prueba de concepto.

translation.en: That's not the kind of investment I'm comfortable making
translation.es: No es el tipo de inversión que haga cómodamente

translation.en: without a guarantee that the woman in charge
translation.es: sin tener la garantía de que la mujer a cargo

translation.en: is willing to put whatever is necessary on the line to ensure its success.
translation.es: está dispuesta a dar lo que se necesite para asegurar el éxito.

translation.en: In this case...
a night alone with her husband.
translation.es: una noche a solas con su esposo.

translation.en: My offer expires in 24 hours.
What's your name?
- Valerie Simmons. - Valerie...
I see you're wearing the same mint Chanel
translation.es: Veo que traes el mismo Chanel

translation.en: they put me in for my Forbes spread back in...
translation.es: que me pusieron para la nota que le di a Forbes en…

translation.en: What was it? 2015? Yes, Miss Montgomery.
Stand up, sweetie.
My lawyers are currently waging a libel suit
translation.es: Mis abogados están librando una demanda por difamación

translation.en: against that dated rag's former editor,
translation.es: contra el antiguo editor de esa basura.

translation.en: and had you done the slightest bit of research,
translation.es: Y si hubieras investigado solo un poco,

translation.en: you might have reconsidered wearing that embarrassing cry for attention,
translation.es: quizá no hubieras hecho este vergonzoso intento de llamar la atención,

translation.en: as all you've succeeded in doing today is exposing your own inadequacy.
translation.es: porque todo lo que lograste hoy fue exponer tus carencias.

translation.en: It's incredible.
Eighteen million views in three days.
translation.es: Dieciocho millones de vistas en tres días.

translation.en: Don't do this to yourself.
What kind of person gets off on making others feel stupid
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de persona hace que otros se sientan tontos,

translation.en: and powerless and disposable?
A shitty one.
It's weird not having Castro here.
translation.es: Es raro no tener a Castro aquí.

translation.en: I'll meet up with Marcos between shifts and pick him up tomorrow.
translation.es: Me veré con Marcos entre turnos y lo recogeré mañana.

translation.en: No, I'll do it.
Tell me again how everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Dime de nuevo que todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: Everything is going to be okay.
Castro! Come here, Castro!
Oh, hi. How much I missed you!
You and Sean live it up like rock stars the other night?
translation.es: ¿Sean y tú pasaron una noche como rockstars?

translation.en: You know it.
After a few drinks, we got to talking about Lionel's challenge
translation.es: Después de unos tragos, hablamos del desafío de Lionel

translation.en: and decided to order half a dozen couples up to the room.
translation.es: Después de unos tragos, hablamos del desafío de Lionel y decidimos pedir media docena de parejas.

translation.en: Only half a dozen?
- Prude. - Oh, yeah?
I remember when the most risqué thing in your closet was a pinstriped Oxford.
translation.es: Recuerdo que lo más atrevido de tu armario era una Oxford a rayas.

translation.en: - - Now I'm guessing...
translation.es: Recuerdo que lo más atrevido de tu armario era una Oxford a rayas. Ahora supongo que serán… ¿unas chaparreras de cuero?

translation.en: pleated, leather chaps.
translation.es: Ahora supongo que serán… ¿unas chaparreras de cuero?

translation.en: Don't! Don't!
Oh. The things we do for our first boyfriends.
translation.es: Lo que uno hace por su primer novio.

translation.en: First and last, hopefully.
I want with Lionel what you have with Sean.
translation.es: Quiero con Lionel lo que tienes con Sean.

translation.en: What's that, exactly?
Total trust.
And you two are invincible no matter what the universe throws at you.
translation.es: Ustedes son invencibles sin importar qué les arroje el universo.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the universe has been having a field day with us recently.
translation.es: Pues, el universo se está dando un festín con nosotros.

translation.en: And that brings me to my not- so- elegant segue.
translation.es: Y eso me lleva a una transición no muy elegante.

translation.en: Papa would kill me if he knew I was telling you this, but...
translation.es: Papá me mataría si supiera que te lo digo, pero…

translation.en: La Cuchara's been going through a rough patch.
translation.es: …La Cuchara está teniendo una mala racha.

translation.en: He asked if I knew when you might be able to pay the loan back.
translation.es: Me preguntó si sabía cuándo podrías pagarle.

translation.en: It's gonna be a while.
How bad is it?
Turns out the money they gave you didn't come from savings.
translation.es: Resulta que no te dieron de sus ahorros.

translation.en: They got a second mortgage on the restaurant.
translation.es: Sacaron una segunda hipoteca del restaurante.

translation.en: If they default...
they could lose everything.
All my cases have been pro bono this year, so I'm pretty tapped.
translation.es: Todo el año trabajé pro bono, así que no tengo dinero.

translation.en: I'd ask Lionel, but he's been--
No, it's my responsibility, Marcos.
I will take care of it.
I'll never forget the day I met my wife.
translation.es: Nunca olvidaré el día que la conocí.

translation.en: For those of you who don't know the story, there's this spot in Corona Heights Park
translation.es: Para quienes no conocen la historia, hay un lugar en Corona Heights Park

translation.en: where my brother and I used to play catch.
After he died, it kind of became my go- to place for heavy thinking.
translation.es: Cuando él murió, se convirtió en mi lugar para ir a pensar.

translation.en: Which I was doing a lot of last year,
especially on the day the Giants told me they weren't picking up my contract.
translation.es: En especial cuando los Gigantes no renovaron mi contrato.

translation.en: Giants suck!
No, no. I had a terrible season, Archer, you know it, I know it,
translation.es: No, tuve una temporada horrible, Archer. Tú lo sabes, yo lo sé,

translation.en: - the whole city knew it. - Story's got a happy ending, though.
translation.es: toda la ciudad lo sabía. Hay un final feliz.

translation.en: I'm getting to that, if you'll let me.
translation.es: Estoy llegando a eso, si me dejas.

translation.en: So when I get to the park that day...
I find this...
incredibly beautiful...
really inconvenient grad student sitting on my bench, working on her biology thesis.
translation.es: …estudiante de posgrado en mi banca trabajando en su tesis de Biología.

translation.en: And while there's this massive deadline hanging over her head,
translation.es: Y aunque la fecha de entrega la acosaba,

translation.en: she took pity on a total stranger... and let me share the bench with her.
translation.es: se compadeció de un desconocido y me dejó compartir la banca.

translation.en: It wasn't until after the sun went down...
that I realized what...
what started out as one of the toughest days of my life...
translation.es: …lo que era uno de los peores días de mi vida…

translation.en: had turned into one of the best.
translation.es: …se había convertido en uno de los mejores.

translation.en: If you hadn't let me sit down with you that day, I... I have
translation.es: Si no me hubieras dejado sentar contigo ese día,

translation.en: no idea what my future might have turned into.
translation.es: no sé cuál hubiera sido mi futuro.

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
Is this seat taken?
Want me to go first?
Nah, I got the cleat.
Todd and I found out we made it into the fire academy today.
translation.es: Nos aceptaron a Todd y a mí en la Academia de bomberos.

translation.en: Oh, my God. That's--
Intense timing.
I know.
I'm so proud of you.
Thanks, but both our backs are seriously against the wall right now.
translation.es: Gracias, pero ambos estamos contra la pared.

translation.en: We can't afford a downshift in income.
Even a temporary one, so I...
translation.es: Ni siquiera por un tiempo, así que…

translation.en: I came here to think about our options.
Everything that's gotten us to this point.
translation.es: En todo lo que nos trajo a este punto.

translation.en: And?
And the first thing that popped into my head was how crazy it is we ever met in the first place.
translation.es: Y lo primero que me vino a la cabeza es lo loco que fue siquiera conocernos.

translation.en: What if you decided to study at the library that day instead of here?
translation.es: ¿Y si hubieras ido a la biblioteca ese día en lugar de venir aquí?

translation.en: Or if Todd hadn't gotten called into work. I...
translation.es: ¿O si Todd no hubiera ido a trabajar?

translation.en: might have been drowning myself at some bar with him instead of meeting my future wife.
translation.es: Yo hubiera ido con él a un bar en lugar de conocer a mi futura esposa.

translation.en: It's a real rabbit hole thinking about the things that had to go exactly right,
translation.es: Es una locura pensar todo lo que debió ocurrir,

translation.en: stuff that had to go so fucking terrible to lead us both to this bench
translation.es: las cosas terribles que ocurrieron para traernos a ambos a esta banca

translation.en: at that moment, on that day.
So I've been sitting here going over what you said...
translation.es: Así que me senté aquí a pensar en lo que dijiste.

translation.en: about...
feeling disposable and-- Powerless.
Yeah.
So now I guess I'm wondering how you'd feel if we made a decision to take some power back.
translation.es: Y me pregunto qué te parecería si decidimos recuperar el poder.

translation.en: I've been wondering the same thing.
We've both come through...
...a hell of a lot in our lives.
But at least we know...
we can trust each other to handle anything.
And...
I don't think there's any way someone as patently pathetic as Anne Montgomery
translation.es: …no creo que alguien tan evidentemente patética como Anne Montgomery

translation.en: has what it takes to get in between that, not in one night.
translation.es: tenga lo necesario para interferir con eso en una noche.

translation.en: Not in one lifetime.
Well...
we still have a few hours to tell this bitch
translation.es: Todavía tenemos unas horas para decirle a esa perra

translation.en: to go to hell.
But you and me...
we're a lot stronger than she thinks we are.
translation.es: …somos más fuertes de lo que ella cree.

translation.en: So are we saying we're good to do this?
I am if you are.
Then let's do it.
Hello, Lisa.
We accept your offer.
I'll send a car.
Why don't you pour yourself a whiskey.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te sirves un whisky?

translation.en: I don't think so.
There's no need to be nervous. No one said we were.
translation.es: - No estén nerviosos. - Nadie dijo que lo estábamos.

translation.en: Sean, come here for a sec.
She wrote a clause into the contract excluding you from sharing any details
translation.es: Una cláusula del contrato te impide compartir los detalles

translation.en: about what happens after I leave here tonight.
translation.es: de lo que pase después de que me vaya.

translation.en: If you say anything to me or anyone else, we lose the company.
translation.es: Si me dices algo a mí o a alguien más, perderemos la compañía.

translation.en: Why would either of us ever want to talk about this again?
translation.es: ¿Por qué querríamos volver a hablar de esto?

translation.en: The quicker we put tonight behind us, the better.
translation.es: Entre más rápido quede todo atrás, mejor.

translation.en: We just have to trust each other.
It's not you I don't trust.
translation.es: No es en ti en quien no confío.

translation.en: I assume you saw the space for your company's routing numbers.
translation.es: Supongo que viste el espacio donde va la cuenta de la compañía.

translation.en: That's why we're here, isn't it?
Well, it's certainly why you're here.
You'll receive a good faith wire transfer totaling a quarter of my investment, tomorrow morning.
translation.es: Mañana recibirás una transferencia por un cuarto de mi inversión.

translation.en: Twenty million dollars.
Well...
it appears there's only one thing left to do.
translation.es: Parece que solo queda una cosa por hacer.

translation.en: Well, two.
Foster, we'll need a witness.
Sean, may I have your phone, please?
Why do you need his phone?
If you're having second thoughts, now is the time to share them.
translation.es: Si tienes dudas, ahora es el momento de cancelar todo.

translation.en: Not some desperate text in the middle of the night.
translation.es: No con un mensaje desesperado en medio de la noche.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll let you say goodbye.
I love you.
I love you.
Oh, keep the pen. It's one of many.
Come sit with me by the fire.
translation.es: Ven a sentarte junto al fuego.

translation.en: If it's okay, can we not talk anymore and just...
translation.es: Si está bien, ¿podríamos dejar de hablar y solo…

translation.en: do what you brought me here to do?
translation.es: …hacer lo que me trajo a hacer?

translation.en: Well, aren't you just so sweet and innocent?
I haven't even begun to tell you what it is you're doing here.
translation.es: Ni siquiera he empezado a decirte para qué estás aquí.

translation.en: In science, one of the first things you learn
translation.es: En la ciencia, una de las primeras cosas que se aprenden

translation.en: is that you can only trust the things that you can prove.
translation.es: es que solo puedes confiar en las cosas que puedes probar.

translation.en: But if any of you guys ask me to offer...
translation.es: Pero si alguno de ustedes me pidiera que diera…

translation.en: physical proof of...
just how much Sean means to me...
translation.es: …de lo que Sean significa para mí,

translation.en: there's no empirical way that I could.
translation.es: no tendría forma empírica de hacerlo.

translation.en: And this is what's called...
translation.es: Y eso es lo que se llama…

translation.en: the scientific paradox.
- Oh, my God. I am so bad at this. -
translation.es: Dios mío. Soy malísima en esto.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What I'm...
trying to say is...
translation.es: Lo que intento decir es... LAS PARTES NO TENDRÁN COMUNICACIÓN

translation.en: - Falling in love with Sean has taught me-- -
translation.es: NI PROPIEDAD ABSOLUTA DE EMIGEN Enamorarme de él me enseñó que es igual de importante confiar en lo que sientes…

translation.en: ...it's just as important to trust the things that you can feel...
translation.es: Enamorarme de él me enseñó que es igual de importante confiar en lo que sientes…

translation.en: as the things you can prove.
Fuck!
Hey! Hey!
Hello? Can anybody hear me?
- - Fuck.
Sean!
- Sean! -
Sean! Call it off!
They're gone.
Where did you take them?
When I returned, the residence was empty.
Mrs. Montgomery? Are you okay?
Everything's all right, Gabriel. The young lady's under contract.
translation.es: Todo está bien, Gabriel. La joven está bajo contrato.

translation.en: Keycard, please.
What does she get out of it?
Treating people like toys?
translation.es: Con tratar a la gente como juguetes.

translation.en: What motivates Miss Montgomery is far more nuanced than I could say.
translation.es: Lo que motiva a la señorita Montgomery tiene más matices de lo que podría decir.

translation.en: But I have never seen her waste a minute of time on anything...
translation.es: Pero nunca la he visto perder ni un minuto en nada…

translation.en: or anyone...
so insignificant as a toy.
Hello, Cassidy?
Where have you been? Did you get any of my messages?
No, I...
What's happened?
Anne Montgomery just saved our ass to the tune of $20 million.
translation.es: Anne Montgomery acaba de salvarnos con 20 millones de dólares.

translation.en: That's what happened.
Whatever the hell you did to win her over, it could not have paid off any huger.
translation.es: Lo que sea que hiciste para conquistarla dio excelentes resultados.

translation.en: I'll call you back.
Are you okay?
Hey, buddy.
Your hand... What did she...?
We're not allowed to talk about it.
You can... if you want to.
The contract isn't triggered until I start spending her money.
translation.es: El contrato no se activa hasta que use su dinero.

translation.en: Then start spending it.
Nothing I say now will undo what we did. Might as well get what you wanted.
translation.es: Nada que diga deshará lo que hicimos. Al menos ten lo que querías.

translation.en: What I wanted?
Sean, I went back for you. I tried to stop it.
translation.es: Sean, volví por ti. Intenté detenerlo.

translation.en: Say something.
I need to take a shower.
Your breakfast meeting has arrived.
I'll tell 'em you're indisposed.
You think I'm a terrible person, don't you?
translation.es: Crees que soy una persona horrible, ¿no?

translation.en: I think when you've suffered terrible things...
translation.es: Creo que cuando se sufren cosas horribles,

translation.en: you become capable of terrible things.
translation.es: uno se vuelve capaz de cosas horribles.

translation.en: Have the staff clear my calendar. I won't be taking any meetings this morning.
translation.es: Que despejen mi agenda. No tendré ninguna reunión esta mañana.

translation.en: ♪ Give me more ♪
translation.es: EL NOVATO DEL MOMENTO SE APAGA

translation.en: ♪ Underneath and inside ♪
translation.es: DONOVAN QUEDA FUERA LUEGO DE EXPLOTAR EN EL JUEGO

translation.en: ♪ Just to come around ♪ ♪ More, give me more, give me more ♪
translation.es: HOMBRE LUCHA POR SU VIDA TRAS GOLPIZA EN BAR
